Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad clue collection focused on tram color and destination sign, gathering overall leads without a specific hypothesis

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused verification of hypothesis that location is Majorstuen using street names, shop front and tram fleet number
Refining search terms and confirming Oslo location via the ’PAPER & TEA’ shop and SL18 tram model
Confirming Kongens gate by matching street view imagery with building layout
Verifying location on Google Maps Street View showing PAPER & TEA and the distant hill
Reviewing architectural details and hill appearance against the identified street view
Identifying exact spot in Kvadraturen using tram, architecture and shop markers
Pinpointing final location using tram route direction and PAPER & TEA signage
Final verification with intersection (Prinsens gate) and building style matching

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Moved from broad clue gathering to targeted hypothesis testing of Majorstuen using specific map and tram details
